name: Ajeromi General Hospital
services: ANTE-NATAL, POST-NATAL CLINIC: Pregnancy tests ante-natal examinations smear tests (by appointment only) gynecological assessments referral to hospital services as appropriate Post-natal examinations.
DIABETES CLINIC: Investigations of - glucose level in blood urine (for protein, glucose, acetone) blood pressure Weight
FAMILY PLANNING CLINIC: Counseling, Immunizations, Application of IUD/ Family planning measures
VOLUNTARY COUNCELLING AND TESTING CLINIC: Counseling and Testing of patients for HIV, Treatment / Management of HIV cases
DOTS CLINIC: Treatment for patients with Tuberculosis
EYE CLINIC: Checking of Central visual filed
MEDICAL RECORDS/INFORMATION DEPARTMENT: Medical information Statistics
OPHTHALMIC CLINIC: Eye care services provided by Ophthalmologist

PAEDIATRIC (CHILDREN)  CLINIC: Pediatric consultation for children
PHARMACY DEPARTMENT: Supply of drugs and treatment materials
comments: It's a state hospital, with Nigerian-level health care, it needs major improvement in terms of equipment, and infrastructure, not the best but can be, they have excellent doctors and nurses

A good hospital with hard working staff. But I must confess I only had dealings with the Maternity department. The Midwives were gentle and thoughtful. I had issues with paying some cash because of the short of human resource and it tool like forever to pay the fees I needed to pay for

The hospital was so big, neat, clean and very attractive. Enough trained Doctors, Nurses and Lab. Scientists. I love their services to patients and the way they issues like emergency cases. Enough parking space for staffs cars, patients and hospital' ambulance

I passed by this place, it's a government owned hospital with a large area of land, adequate spaces for car parks, looks clean and neat, big and very attractive. There is ATM provision right in the hospital. It serves the people of ikorodu. It's is accessible

It's fairly okay. The usual Nigerian standard of public facility. Usually crowded. Go early so you can leave early
Stressful like any other public or general hospitals but effective
It is a secondary health facility. The compound of the hospital is not spacious so they have limited space for car park which mostly reserved for staffs of the hospital

Trees are planted around the facility and close to the car park where visitors can relax

address.street: 38 Uyo Street, Off Stadium Rd, Rumuomasi

services: Kidney: Lithotripsy, Dialysis, Transplant, Laparascopic Renal Surgery

comments: Savealife Mission Hospital is a 150 bedded multispecialty hospital equipped with the latest technology in Medicine. We cheer a clear vision of reversing medical tourism towards Africa

It is an ultra modern facility equipped to cater for all cases in gynaecology, urology, orthopedic/spine, gastro enterology, ENT, cardiology and ophthalmology, etc, using the latest technology in medicine. It has comfortable standard, deluxe, executive and presidential suites, delivering hospitality at its best
The vision of the hospital is to make Nigeria a global Healthcare destination through the provision of world-class healthcare services powered by superior technology in medicine

comments: Our objective is to maximally exploit medical sciences in the art of health management and preservation of life with regards to The Ultimate Intelligence

Our core values are to offer Fast medical interventions, maintain high professional Integrity, Respect the person and right of our patients, observe all Safety considerations in the process of task execution, and employ a Team approach to health management

The new face of First Rivers Hospital has really changed alot of things, friendly, dedicated and professional staffs, latest modern medical facilities, neat, safe & serene environment and very quick responses to emergencies. One of the best hospitals in the Garden City
Pretty organized. The computerized operations makes for quick turn around. The staff were courteous. Service was quick

Fairly great service. The nurses are a bit calm and attend promptly to patients

name: Madonna Hospital
services: Paediatrics: The Paediatrics Department has two Neonatal wards (in-born and out-born) equipped with Photo-Therapy stands and 8 Incubators There are also two Paediatric Wards with 6 beds each. The department provides child welfare services including Immunization and growth monitoring
Maternity: The unit has an Obstetrics/Gynaecology ward with Six (6) beds, labour Room equipped with neonatal resuscitation equipments
GENERAL WARDS: The four (4) General Wards have Six (6) Beds each. All the Wards are connected to Cable TV
PRIVATE WARDS: There are two fully air-conditioned rooms with cable TV connectivity and refrigerator
VIP WARDS: There are Nine (9) well furnished, Air-conditioned rooms with independent Cable TV and a refrigerator

Laboratory: The laboratory is equipped with state of the art equipments in the running of Haematology, Chemistry, Immunology, Microbiology and Parasitology. There is an air-conditioned waiting room with Cable TV where patients can relax while waiting for their results
Physiotherapy: Physiotherapy services is available in the facility
Pharmacy: There are two well stocked Pharmacies (Main and Mini). It has a sterile compounding unit attached to it
Mortuary: The hospital has a Mortuary for morgue services

Theatre: The MAJOR THEATRE is equipped with Diathermy Machines, Electro-hydrolyic Operating Table; the latest Model of Anaesthetic Machine with Ventilator, Vaporizer, and Patient Monitors. The MINOR THEATRE is used for Minor Procedures. Doctors Consulting Room. Endoscopy Suite
LAUNDRY UNIT: The hospital has its own laundry unit to ensure clean patientâ€™s linens

POWER SUPPLY: The hospital is connected to the public power supply through a dedicated Transformer. It has a 114, 13 KVA Sound Proof Generator and 9KVA Gasoline generator with solar inverter generator installed at various blocks of the hospital to guaranteeing 24hrs power supply
comments: Madonna hospital, a subsidiary of Madonna Health Services Limited is located in the heart of Makurdi the Benue State Capital

Madonna hospital is also a GLOBAL FUND site for free comprehensive HIV/AIDS services. It is a National Health Insurance Scheme (NHIS) accredited facility for Primary and Secondary services in addition to having Corporate Clients and Private Health insurance Schemes

comment: Top private hospital in Italy
The Institute specializes in Rehabilitation and is able to offer care support to individuals of all ages.

The institute was first recognized by the Italian Ministry of Health as a research hospital in 1972, for its expertise in diabetes research and cure. The recognition was then extended to the entire field of molecular medicine in 2001.

Formed in June 2018, it is the result of the administrative merger of the AMC and VUmc.

name: The Nairobi West Hospital
comment: Multispeciality hospital with 40+ years of providing high-quality medical care.
Full-fledged 24 hour ultra-modern facility

name: Singapore General Hospital (SGH)
comment: SGH is the largest acute tertiary hospital in Singapore and ranked among the worldâ€™s best.

name: The University of Tokyo Hospital
comment: Until 2000, there were three hospitals in The University of Tokyo. In 2001, the University Branch Hospital was merged with the University (Main) Hospital to innovate the New University Hospital.
The hospital has 1,210 beds (1,150 in the general ward, 60 in the psychiatric ward)
Tokyo University Hospital is the best hospital in Japan due to its national ranking and holds the 8th position in the world hospitals ranking according to Newsweek magazine.

name: Johns Hopkins Hospital
comment: Johns Hopkins Hospital is a world renowned leader in patient care
Nationally ranked in 15 adult and 10 pediatric specialties and rated high performing in 19 adult procedures and conditions
For 21 consecutive years from 1991 to 2020, it was ranked as the best overall hospital in the United States by U.S. News & World Report.

name: Massachusetts General Hospital
comment: Recognized as a top hospital in the nation by U.S. News & World Report for 2025-2026.
It is the third-oldest general hospital in the United States with a patient capacity of 999 beds.
It is the original and largest clinical education and research facility of Harvard Medical School/Harvard University, and houses the world's largest hospital-based research program

name: Cleveland Clinic
comment: Performed the first coronary artery bypass surgery and the first face transplant in the U.S.
In 2018â€“2019, the U.S. News & World Report ranked Cleveland Clinic as the number 2 hospital in the Best Hospitals Honor Roll, as it was nationally ranked in 14 adult and 10 pediatric specialties.
As of 2025, it has been named the No. 2 hospital in the world for the seventh consecutive year by Newsweek.
Internationally facilities in places like Toronto, Abu Dhabi, London, and Florida.

name: Seoul National University Hospital
comment: Leading hospital in South Korea
The South Korean government's Ministry of Education and Human Resources partly supervises management of the hospital.
24-hour emergency contact service to respond promptly to emergency situations
More than 30,000 patients from over 80 countries per year.
Cashless billing service and coordination with national embassies and international insurance companies

name: Apollo Hospitals
comment: Multinational healthcare group headquartered in Bengaluru. It is the largest for-profit private hospital network in India, with a network of 71 owned and managed hospitals.

The hospital is internationally recognized for clinical excellence and patient safety and caters to over 1,00,000 patients annually, including international medical travelers. It houses state-of-the-art diagnostics, operating rooms, and ICUs to handle complex treatments across specialties.

name: Bumrungrad International Hospital

address.street: 33 Soi Sukhumvit 3, Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana

comment: Thailand's top international hospital
Bumrungrad International Hospital has been a global pioneer in providing world-class healthcare services and international patient support for nearly four decades
One of the largest private hospitals in Southeast Asia, Bumrungrad International Hospital cares for over 1.1 million patients from more than 190 countries annually.

name: King Faisal Specialist Hospital

address.street: At Takhassusi, Al Madhar Ash Shamali

comment: Saudi Arabia's leading referral hospital
KFSH&RC is a leading healthcare, research, and education institution recognized throughout Saudi Arabia and the Middle East.

name: Asan Medical Center
comment: AMC is the largest and most advanced hospital in South Korea and is considered a global leader in specialized medical care
Asan Medical Center is the parent hospital of the eight hospitals under the ASAN foundation.
The hospital complex occupies approximately 85,000 square meters and has more than 2,700 patient beds. It treats millions of outpatients and inpatients annually.

name: The Alfred Hospital
comment: Named in honor of Prince Alfred, Duke of Edinburgh, who survived an assassination attempt during a visit to Australia in 1868.
The hospital is one of two major adult trauma centres in Victoria and houses the largest intensive care unit in Australia.
Provides a comprehensive range of specialist medical and surgical services including Australiaâ€™s busiest trauma centre.
Operate's one of the largest and most advanced intensive care units (ICU) in the southern hemisphere

name: Groote Schuur Hospital
comment: Famous for the first human heart transplant
The hospital is internationally renowned as the training ground for some of South Africa's best doctors, surgeons and nurses.
Groote Schuur is Dutch for 'Great Barn' and is named after the original Groote Schuur estate laid out by Dutch settlers when the city of Cape Town was founded in the 17th century.

name: Chris Hani Baragwanath Academic Hospital
comment: The World's 3rd Biggest Hospital
The hospital has a capacity of around 3,400 beds, employs over 6,700 staff members, and features approximately 10 km of corridors.
Originally known as Baragwanath Hospital, it was renamed in 1993 to honor Chris Hani, an anti-apartheid activist who was assassinated earlier that year.
It serves as a major teaching hospital for the University of the Witwatersrand Medical School.

name: Tygerberg Hospital
comment: Largest hospital in the Western Cape and the second largest hospital in South Africa.
Each year more than 107 215 patients are admitted in Tygerberg Hospital, while more than 492 670 patients visit Tygerberg Hospital annually.
To become a patient at Tygerberg, a person must be referred by a primary or secondary health care facility.

name: Netcare Milpark Hospital
comment: Nelson Mandela was treated at the hospital for an acute respiratory infection in January 2011 and underwent a laparoscopy there in February 2012.
The first private facility in South Africa, and one of only three to date, to achieve level 1 accreditation by the Trauma Society of South Africa.
The hospital also houses the only Gamma Knife unit in South Africa

name: Privatklinik Bethanien
comment: As the first Swiss hospital certified by ISO 9002, it prioritizes delivering the highest quality services, meeting the standards of ISO 9001:2015
Since February 2022, Privatklinik Bethanien has been equipped with a Papillon 50 device
A prominent multi-specialty hospital in Switzerland with 470 beds, the hospital serves over 5,000 patients annually, with approximately 500 births in the maternity wards.

name: Klinik Hirslanden
comment: Founded in 212 it operates as a private medical facility offering modern infrastructure and medical expertise accessible to patients across all insurance classes.

name: AOU di Modena
comment: The Gastroenterology and Hepatology Division of Modena University Hospital is a national reference center for diagnosis and treatment of liver diseases

name: Korle Bu Teaching Hospital
comment: It is currently the third largest hospital in Africa and the leading national referral centre in Ghana.

Korle Bu, which means the valley of the Korle lagoon, was established as a General Hospital to address the health needs of the indigenous people under Sir Gordon Guggisbergâ€™s administration,the then Governor of the Gold Coast.

name: 37 Military Hospital
comment: Well-known military hospital
It was named 37 because it was the 37th military hospital to be built in the British colony of West Africa.

As a military hospital, its primary objective is to provide health care to military personnel and their families, civilian employees of the Ministry of Defence and their families and ex-service personnel, all of whom are grouped as Entitled Personnel.

name: Tema General Hospital
comment: Main hospital serving Tema and surrounding areas
Tema General Hospital is a referral hospital that provides excellent clinical services with research orientation, excellence and innovation.

name: Koforidua Regional Hospital
comment: Regional referral hospital in the Eastern Region

name: Tamale Teaching Hospital

The Tamale Teaching Hospital (TTH) was commissioned in 1974 as a Regional Hospital to provide health care services to the people of Tamale and its environs.

name: Sunyani Teaching Hospital
comment: The Regional Hospital was established on 11th May 1927 by the then Colonial Masters as a Hospital for the people of Western Ashanti.

Currently the hospital has 350 beds and it is strategically located to provide advanced health services to the people of the Bono, Ahafo, Bono East regions beyond including clients from Cote d'ivoire and Burkina Faso.

name: Cape Coast Teaching Hospital

name: Ho Teaching Hospital

name: Effia Nkwanta Regional Hospital

address.street: Opposite UEW Research Center J B DAMPSON ST, Winneba

comment: Providing a comprehensive, accessible and high quality care which is client centered

name: Bawku Presbyterian Hospital
comment: NHIS accredited Presbyterian hospital
Basic health services, which are community driven and accessible to all manner of persons
331-bed facility managed by the Presbyterian Church

name: Ejura Government Hospital
comment: Serves as the primary hospital for residents of Ejura and the surrounding communities.

name: Mampong Government Hospital
comment: An academic paper notes the hospital has provided free maternal care and improved maternal enrollment.

name: Kenyatta National Hospital
comment: Kenyatta National Hospital is the oldest hospital in Nairobi
It is the largest hospital in the country and East Africa as well.

name: AAR Hospital

address.street: Muthaiga North Rd, Kiambu road opp Karura Forest

comment: 140-bed private hospital in Nairobi
Within each ward, the rooms are divided into a single bed, 2-bed, 3-beds, and the largest 4-bed units all ensuite.

name: Mater Misericordiae Hospital

address.street: Along Mukenia & Dunga Road, South B

services: Sexual Gender Based Violence(SGBV) Survivor Center & PITC
comment: Well-known private hospital in Kenya
A 164- bed tertiary-level facility, widely recognised for its maternity and cardiac care services.
General physicians in Nairobi and Specialist doctors in Kenya provide multidisciplinary medical services at Mater Misericordiae Hospital.

comment: Private clinic listed among international hospitals in Africa

name: Clinique des Princes
comment: Well-known private clinic in Casablanca

name: International Medical Center (ICC)

address.street: km. 42 Ismailia desert road El- Shorouk City

comment: Leading private hospital in Egypt
One of the largest tertiary health care hospitals in the Middle East.
Was established by the Egyptian Armed Forces with American expertise and cooperation from the US Army Corps of Engineers.

The IMC serves both military personnel and the general public, including international patients. It has also received JCI accreditation, indicating that it operates at international standards for patient care.

name: Misr International Hospital

address.street: 12 El Saraya St., Veiny Sq. Dokki

comment: A renowned hospital that provides quality medical care to patients from all over Egypt and the Middle East.
The hospital has 10 operating rooms equipped with state-of-the-art medical technology. It is provided with the latest western scientific equipment from Europe and the United States.

comment: A well-established institution with over 20 years of experience in the Angolan market, providing both private and corporate services
A diverse team comprised of both Angolan and international employees

name: Bokamoso Private Hospital
comment: In addition to the above, Bokamoso Private Hospital is also the only hospital outside of the USA to receive Heart Failure accreditation

name: Orota Referral Hospital
comment: The hospital has 200 beds and gives medical services to people from all over Eritrea with critical condition
The hospital frequently collaborates with international medical experts from countries like Italy and Germany to conduct specialized surgeries and provide training.
The Hospital stands as a beacon of healthcare excellence in Eritrea, fostering a culture of research, education, and patient-centered care.

name: HÃ´pital National Niamey
comment: This is Niamey's largest hospital, with all branches of medicine. Resources are often lacking, despite the dedication of its staff.
It has 244 beds and was founded in 1922.
